title: Rohingya Migrants Left Out At Sea, No Country Will Allow Them Ashore
teaser: Rohingya Muslims are fleeing their homeland of Myanmar but no country will take them in. Steve Inskeep talks to Matthew Smith of Fortify Rights, a nonprofit watchdog that documents Rohingyas' plight.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
